sources.title: Destination Magoo (1954)
sources.description: The title of this short is a play on the title of the feature film Destination Moon (which itself has an animated sequence made by Walter Lantz and starring Woody Woodpecker) and once again Magoo and his myopia take an adventure, hand in hand, off to the "Moon". The life that man leads! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/destination-magoo-1954/

metadata.Plot: Mr. Magoo accidentally crashes his old college roommate's rocket ship at a Coney Island amusement park (Luna Park) and thinks he's landed on the surface of the moon.
metadata.Writer: Jim Backus, Jerry Hausner, Tedd Pierce
